column1: echo ¦wget¦-O - http://download.pegasus.isi.edu/pegasus/gpg.txt | sudo apt-key add - && echo 'deb [arch=amd64] http://download.pegasus.isi.edu/pegasus/ubuntu trusty main' | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/pegasus.list && apt-get update && yes |... :: Filesystem_operation

echo ¦echo¦"deb http://research.cs.wisc.edu/htcondor/ubuntu/stable/ trusty contrib" >> /etc/apt/sources.list && wget -qO - http://research.cs.wisc.edu/htcondor/ubuntu/HTCondor-Release.gpg.key | sudo apt-key add - && yes | apt-get update && yes |... :: Filesystem_operation
